#summary This Wiki has a little information about the SED_ED SED-ML editor.

= Introduction =

The SED-ED editor is an application and Eclipse plugin for viewing and editing [http://sedml.org SED-ML] files. 


= Details =

The features of the editor will be:

  * Show a graphical view of SEDML components
  * Allow editing of fields
  * Assistance with generation of XPath expressions for targetting XML models
  *
